snippet: The Guatemalan presidential candidate Manuel Baldizón quit his political party and dropped out of the race on Monday.
abstract: Manuel Baldizon ends his campaign for Guatemalan presidency after placing third in first round of voting, behind comedian and former first lady Sandra Torres; once-favored candidate, who was tainted by his association with ousted Pres Otto Perez Molina, questions legitimacy of vote but does not demand recount.
lead_paragraph: The Guatemalan presidential candidate Manuel Baldizón quit his political party and dropped out of the race on Monday.

headline.main: Guatemala: Former Front-Runner Drops Out of Presidential Race
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Guatemala: Former Front-Runner Drops Out of Presidential Race
